mapper.select: select * from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT_SALES s, study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p where p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID=s.MKT_PRODUCT_ID order by s.PRODUCT_SALE desc limit 8
select * from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT_SALES s, study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p where p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID=s.MKT_PRODUCT_ID and p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY='${code}' order by s.PRODUCT_SALE desc limit 8
select * from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p where p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY='${code}' order by p.PRODUCT_REGISTRATION desc limit 8
